chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog, a stickler for routine, croaked, "💊 Chirp! 10 PM! Medicine!" every night. Penelope the chick usually chirped a sleepy "Thanks, Ferdie! 😴" One night, Penelope was playing a very important game of hopscotch with a ladybug 🐞. *Ding!* 10 PM. Ferdinand waited. Silence. He hopped over, finding Penelope mid-hop. "CHIRP!" he croaked, pointing emphatically. Penelope, startled, swallowed a stray pebble instead. 😳 Ferdinand just shook his amphibian head. "Now you need *two* medicines." 🐸🐥
